title: The volume is too low when listening to music using a headset
answer:
You can turn up the volume using the volume up button when music is playing.

Check if there are any objects blocking the earphones. Please clean the earphones on a regular basis.

Try playing a ringtone file with the volume turned up to see whether there is a problem with the audio source. If there is a problem with the audio source, try again after changing the file.

As the phone's output voltage is limited, music may not play properly when using a high-spec, high-fidelity headset.
keywords: headset, listen to music, quiet, muffled, distortion, too quiet
